TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit XmlNavigatorFilter extends System.Object

Docs.summary: provides a flexible filtering abstraction over . Callers do not know what type of filtering will occur; they simply call or . The filter implementation invokes the appropriate operation on the in order to skip over filtered nodes.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

Docs.summary: Provides a flexible filtering abstraction over .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool IsFiltered(class System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator navigator) cil managed
Public MustOverride Function IsFiltered (navigator As XPathNavigator) As Boolean

Docs.summary: Return if the navigator's current node matches the filter condition.
Docs.returns: if the current node matches the condition; otherwise, .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool MoveToContent(class System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator navigator) cil managed
Public MustOverride Function MoveToContent (navigator As XPathNavigator) As Boolean

Docs.summary: Repositions the navigator to the first matching content node or attribute and skips over filtered nodes. If there are no matching nodes, the navigator does not move and the method returns false.
Docs.returns: if the navigator is repositioned on a child element with a matching name, otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks This is an abstract class and the filter, such as an element name, used to reposition the navigator is not defined by this class but by the class that derives from this class.

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract bool MoveToFollowing (System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator navigator, System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator navigatorEnd);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool MoveToFollowing(class System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator navigator, class System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator navigatorEnd) cil managed
Public MustOverride Function MoveToFollowing (navigator As XPathNavigator, navigatorEnd As XPathNavigator) As Boolean
public: abstract bool MoveToFollowing(System::Xml::XPath::XPathNavigator ^ navigator, System::Xml::XPath::XPathNavigator ^ navigatorEnd);
abstract member MoveToFollowing : System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator * System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator -> bool

Docs.param: An instance of the class that identifies the beginning of the range over which navigation can move.
An instance of the class that identifies the end of the range over which navigation can move.
Docs.summary: Repositions the navigator to the following matching content node or attribute and skips over filtered nodes. If there are no matching nodes, the navigator does not move and the method returns false.
Docs.returns: if the navigator is repositioned on the next element with a matching name, otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks This is an abstract class and the filter, such as an element name, used to reposition the navigator is not defined by this class but by the class that derives from this class.

Docs.summary: Repositions the navigator to the sibling matching content node or descendent and skips over filtered nodes. If there are no matching nodes, the navigator does not move and the method returns false.
Docs.returns: if the navigator is repositioned on the next element sibling with a matching name, otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks This is an abstract class and the filter, such as an element name, used to reposition the navigator is not defined by this class but by the class that derives from this class.

Docs.summary: Repositions the navigator to the next matching content node or attribute and skips over filtered nodes. If there are no matching nodes, the navigator does not move and the method returns false.
Docs.returns: if the navigator is repositioned on the next element child with a matching name, otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks This is an abstract class and the filter, such as an element name, used to reposition the navigator is not defined by this class but by the class that derives from this class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool MoveToPreviousSibling(class System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator navigator) cil managed
Public MustOverride Function MoveToPreviousSibling (navigator As XPathNavigator) As Boolean

Docs.summary: Repositions the navigator to the previous matching sibling node and skips over filtered nodes. If there are no matching nodes, the navigator does not move and the method returns false.
Docs.returns: if the navigator is repositioned on the previous element sibling with a matching name, otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks This is an abstract class and the filter, such as an element name, used to reposition the navigator is not defined by this class but by the class that derives from this class.
